Episodes.Title: Yesterday's Jam
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: Jen starts at Reynholm industries as the IT Manager. But it turns out she doesn't know anything about computers.

Episodes.Title: Calamity Jen
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: Denholm invites a stress expert when he starts a war against stress. Jen has a shoe problem which has a serious effect.

Episodes.Title: Fifty-Fifty
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: When Roy gets dumped after a date, he starts believing that girls go for "bad boys" and creates a fake profile on a dating site and, surprisingly, gets a response. Meanwhile, Jen starts flirting with a security guard.

Episodes.Title: The Red Door
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: Moss puts a picture of his head on his cup to make sure it doesn't get lost. Curious about the red door behind Roy's desk, Jen ignores the boys' warnings never to open it, and goes in. She finds the vampiric Richmond inside.

Episodes.Title: The Haunting of Bill Crouse
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: Jen goes on a bad date with a colleague, Bill. Not wanting to ever see Bill again, she asks Moss to come up with a lie that would send Bill away for good if he comes to visit her. Moss panics under pressure and tells Bill that Jen...

Episodes.Title: Aunt Irma Visits
Episodes.Actors: Chris O'Dowd, Richard Ayoade, Katherine Parkinson
Episodes.Plot: Jen has her period and she starts to see the same symptoms in the boys. They say that it's impossible but they reconsider after they start having the same symptoms as Jen. They're even given their own website after talking about i...
